chunks.text: Spec Top Computer SCI:, Section 091 - Announcements: Homework 5 Spec Top Computer SCI:, Section 091 - Announcements: Homework 5 Posted Saturday, November 29, 2025 12:12 PM EST Homework 5 has been released on Gradescope and Brightspace and is due by 11:59 PM on Friday, December 12 . Please make sure to follow the submission guidelines: Upload your answers on Gradescope : here Submit a single PDF that includes copies of your Jupyter Notebooks in PDF format, along with screenshots, and elaborate on them thoroughly. Upload a ZIP file containing all your notebooks on Brightspace. Late Policy: You are granted a total of 5 late days across all assignments for the course. These days are shared cumulatively â€” for example, if you use 3 late days on HW1, you will have 2 remaining for the rest of the term. Spec Top Computer SCI:, Section 091 Go to Announcements >> You are receiving this message because you subscribed to receive instant notifications via email. Change Notification Settings
